title: Cannot insert inline images in (newest Android) version
creator: ssum
content:
I recently downloaded my favourite email client, Thunderbird, from Play Store into my Moto G Plus phone and am using an IMAP connection to my server. I found that I cannot insert an inline image, e.g. a graphic signature, in this app. I tried many indirect ways to do it but no luck.

I think this should be a basic feature.

Thanks, Steve
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Safari/537.36

title: Android Galaxy 22Ultra. How to delete multi emails
content: I have over 1000 emails. how can I delete them but only up to the last say 30 days so I still have them. Or select certain batches of emails to delete, not 1 by 1 as it is now? Thanks
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36
